summary: This is a brief email from a Staff Officer to the UK's Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations) at New Scotland Yard, transmitting a letter from DAC to the United States Attorney with details of a relevant legal representative. It appears to be official UK-US law enforcement communication regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: DAC
persons.context: The author of a letter addressed to the United States Attorney, providing details of a relevant legal representative. The letter is being transmitted by their staff officer.

persons.name: Staff Officer to Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations)
persons.context: The sender of this email, transmitting a letter from DAC to the United States Attorney.

events.title: Transmission of UK-US Legal Correspondence
events.description: A staff officer at New Scotland Yard sends an email transmitting a letter from DAC to the United States Attorney regarding details of a legal representative.
personsInvolved: Staff Officer to Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations)

locations: New Scotland Yard, 4th Floor, Richmond Terrace, Victoria Embankment, London SW1A 2JL, United Kingdom
keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 9, 2019, from UK law enforcement to US authorities.
It transmits a letter from the UK's Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations) to the United States Attorney.
The letter contains details of a relevant legal representative, indicating ongoing legal coordination between the UK and US.
The correspondence originates from New Scotland Yard, the headquarters of the Metropolitan Police in London.
